Sentencas: Currently, reversible solid oxide cells (rSOC) are the only devices that allows a bidirectional conversion of H2O and H2, being able to operate as fuel cell and as electrolyzer.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: Thanks to the high-temperature operation, rSOC present a higher efficiency and additionally, provide a feasible solution for long-term energy storage in electrical systems.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: Experimental testing of rSOC have been mainly focused on cells characterization, thermal or degradation analysis, but the study of transition cycles has not been widely studied.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: The transitions between the operation as a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and as a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) might have a significant impact on the rest of the electrical system in which the rSOC is integrated.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: This article analyzes experimentally the power responses of a rSOC stack, during each operating mode (SOEC-SOFC) and during transition between both modes.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: The results suggest that transition cycles can be achieved in less than 8 min and the total transition from SOEC rated power to SOFC rated power in less than 10 min, having a significant impact on microgrid operations, especially in islanded mode.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: The obtained results indicate that the most suitable role for rSOC in a microgrid is as grid-following.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids

Sentencas: The grid-forming role is only possible if the rSOC operates along with a fast-response power source.
Titulo: Power transition cycles of reversible solid oxide cells and its impacts on microgrids
